tasks.label: npm: sass
tasks.detail: sass --watch src/Components/Main/main.scss src/Components/Main/main.css --source-map & sass --watch src/Components/Navbar/navbar.scss src/Components/Navbar/navbar.css --source-map & sass --watch src/Components/Home/home.scss src/Components/Home/home.css --source-map & sass --watch src/Components/Footer/footer.scss src/Components/Footer/footer.css --source-map & sass --watch src/Components/ReservationForm/reservationform.scss
